title: Relates to the comprehensive school bus driver safety training program
summary: Provides for the transfer of a portion of fines issued for illegally passing a school bus to the comprehensive school bus driver safety training program for the study and promotion of issues involving school bus safety; establishes a school bus motorist education fund.

         relation to the illegal passing of school buses and to amend the state
         finance law, in relation  to  establishing  the  school  bus  motorist
         education fund

   38  ESTABLISHED IN THE JOINT  CUSTODY  OF  THE  STATE  COMPTROLLER  AND  THE

   43  NINE OF THE VEHICLE AND TRAFFIC LAW FOR  VIOLATIONS  OF  SECTION  ELEVEN
   44  HUNDRED  SEVENTY-FOUR  OF  SUCH  LAW, AND ALL OTHER FINES, FEES, GRANTS,
   45  BEQUESTS OR OTHER MONIES CREDITED, APPROPRIATED OR  TRANSFERRED  THERETO
   46  FROM ANY OTHER FUND OR SOURCE.
   47    3.  (A)  FIFTY  PERCENT OF THE MONIES OF THE FUND, FOLLOWING APPROPRI-
   48  ATION BY THE LEGISLATURE, SHALL BE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE  STATE  COMPRE-
   49  HENSIVE  SCHOOL  BUS DRIVER SAFETY TRAINING COUNCIL FOR THE STUDY OF THE
   50  ILLEGAL PASSING OF STOPPED SCHOOL BUSES BY MOTORISTS, AND  THE  DEVELOP-

   52  IN  VIOLATION  OF SECTION ELEVEN HUNDRED SEVENTY-FOUR OF THE VEHICLE AND
   53  TRAFFIC LAW.
   54    (B) THE REMAINING FIFTY PERCENT OF THE MONIES OF SUCH  FUND  SHALL  BE
   55  MADE  AVAILABLE  TO  THE DEPARTMENT OF MOTOR VEHICLES FOR THE DESIGN AND
   56  IMPLEMENTATION,  IN  CONJUNCTION  WITH  THE  GOVERNOR'S  TRAFFIC  SAFETY

   18    S  5. This act shall take effect on the first of January next succeed-
